item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 29, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Send someone you appreciate an official 'Continue and Persist' Letter (784 points | 143 comments)
2. Better Auth – The most comprehensive authentication library for TypeScript (4 points | discuss)
3. The UX of Lego Interface Panels (2020) (349 points | 32 comments)
4. Engineers do not get to make startup mistakes when they build ledgers (170 points | 176 comments)
5. Show HN: Screen Sharing in the Browser (101 points | 20 comments)
6. The trouble with struct sockaddr's fake flexible array (41 points | 7 comments)
7. Show HN: Vince – A self hosted alternative to Google Analytics (66 points | 19 comments)
8. The success and failure of Ninja (2020) (201 points | 39 comments)
9. Borgo Programming Language (36 points | 9 comments)
10. Mirror, Mirror on the Wall, What Is the Best Topology of Them All? (8 points | discuss)
11. A pretty visualisation of the European power grid (2022) (251 points | 133 comments)
12. Using Pandoc and Typst to Produce PDFs (15 points | 7 comments)
13. Physics in Next-Token Prediction (14 points | 2 comments)
14. Multimodal Interpretability in 2024 (18 points | discuss)
15. William James and the philosophy of pragmatism (2018) (61 points | 9 comments)
16. Show HN: Indentation-based syntax for Clojure (37 points | 11 comments)
17. Rapid colonization of a space-returned Ryugu sample by terrestrial microorganism (86 points | 34 comments)
18. The Surprisingly Sunny Origins of the Frankfurt School (3 points | discuss)
19. Bootkitty: Analyzing the first UEFI bootkit for Linux (130 points | 63 comments)
20. A new start after 60: I became a 'hummingbird' for people with dementia (117 points | 17 comments)
21. Float Self-Tagging (47 points | 42 comments)
22. Mechanical Engineer creates instruments for his one man industrial metal band (35 points | 13 comments)
23. Hetzner cuts traffic on US VPSs, raises prices (337 points | 569 comments)
24. 'PDF to Brainrot' study tools are an iteration on a TikTok trend (3 points | discuss)
25. In the Rockets' Red Glare: The past and future of hot-rodding in America (49 points | 44 comments)
26. Show HN: Myphotos.site – Make a gallery website from Google Photos (164 points | 72 comments)
27. The great abandonment: what happens to the natural world when people disappear? (69 points | 76 comments)
28. Spotify has shut down several API endpoints (197 points | 164 comments)
29. Canada Competition Bureau sues Google for anti-competitive conduct in online ads (66 points | 18 comments)
30. A washing machine for human beings, from 1970 (148 points | 192 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 29, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
